title: Signals and Systems
description: Continuous-time linear systems and signals, their mathematical representations, and computational tools.  Fourier and Laplace transforms, convolutions, input-output responses, stability.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2026 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or (ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) or (ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C))
